definition.name: Deploy WordPress on Azure Virtual Machine - Azure Quickstart Template
definition.description: This action helps create an Azure Virtual Machine and deploy Wordpress on it

inputs.name: client-id
inputs.description: Client id to login to azure

inputs.name: tenant-id
inputs.description: Tenant id to login to azure

inputs.name: subscription-id
inputs.description: Subscription id to be used with your az login

inputs.name: resource-group-name
inputs.description: Resource group to deploy your resources to

inputs.name: admin-username
inputs.description: Admin username to login to app

inputs.name: admin-password
inputs.description: Admin password to login to app and mySql

with.parameters: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/master/application-workloads/wordpress/wordpress-single-vm-ubuntu/azuredeploy.parameters.json authenticationType=password mySqlPassword=${{ inputs.admin-password }} vmDnsName=dns-vm-2 vmSize=Standard_D2as_v4 adminUsername=${{ inputs.admin-username }} adminPasswordOrKey=${{inputs.admin-password}}

steps.name: Fetch deployment record - Run Azure PowerShell inline script
